title: #300:  The Outlaw John McAfee
description:
Thank you so much for tuning for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome the last great outlaw in the World, John McAfee, to hear his take on the is mad mad world! Thank you so much for your support.

Please check out all of our platforms:
Our Youtube page
